question: Ellie, an 18-year-old student, encrypts her drive with inbuilt Windows software so that her mischievous brother cannot access her assignments. Which software did Ellie use?
As part of his security implementation plan, Glenn was updating his firewall. Which aspect of the security implementation plan was Glenn working on?

Sarah started a small business with seven employees. She provided every employee with a computer and a common printer which is meant to be shared. Which of the following networks would suit Sarah’s business need?

A new online service allows roommates to input all their household expenses in a ‘share calculator’ program, which calculates and shares the detailed report with all listed roommates. This service is an example of which of the following?
A newly established ITES company plans to launch a website that allows users to share pictures and videos, comment, and re-share them. Under which cloud category will the company’s product fall?
XYZ Infra Solutions seeks a cloud provider who can provide VMs, VLAN, custom apps, on-demand storage, IP addresses, and firewalls. Which cloud computing service can meet the company’s needs?

Which of the following helps to backup data on a Mac?
Which of the following fundamental concepts of security refers to an action taken in advance to protect the system against threats or dangers?

Which Microsoft Edge setting helps to disable pop-ups?
Which Zoom setting helps to disable pop-ups?
You create a full backup on August 1 with File A, B, and C. On August 10, only File B changes, so only B is added. On August 20, only File C changes, so only C is added. What type of backup is this?
In every subsequent update to the backup, only files changed or created after the previous backup are included. Which type of backup is this?

Your browser history is compromised on an Alexa device. Which of the following can help?
Which Mac feature limits time spent on the device?
What is the best package to protect IoT devices?
What is the path to block spam emails?
options: Delete group in Home > Junk > Junk email options > Blocked senders
Add spam filters in Outlook settings
answer: Delete group in Home > Junk > Junk email options > Blocked senders

options: Settings > Privacy and Security > Location Services > Camera > Never
answer: Settings > Privacy and Security > Location Services > Camera > Never

question: Ava wants to filter emails with dangerous attachments in Outlook. Which option under Home -> Delete group -> Junk -> Junk E-mail Options should she use?
Jennifer wants to disable geotagging on her iPhone camera. Which setting should she choose?
options: Settings -> Privacy -> Location services -> Maps -> Never
Settings -> Privacy -> Location services -> App Store -> Never
Settings -> Privacy -> Location services -> Chrome -> Never
Settings -> Privacy -> Location services -> Camera -> Never
answer: Settings -> Privacy -> Location services -> Camera -> Never
